Key Match Events: Coby White scored 28 points for the Chicago Bulls.
The Chicago Bulls gave up the most points to any opponent thus far this season, allowing the Utah Jazz to score 135 points.
The Utah Jazz, previously winless, secured their first victory of the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Matt, Big Dave, and Will Perdue discussed the factors that led to the Bulls' loss to the Jazz.
Will Gottlieb provided insights from the postgame locker room.
Others: The Utah Jazz were missing both Lauri Markkanen and Jordan Clarkson.
Ayo Dosunmu performed well starting in place of Zach LaVine.
